name: Splitsville
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Stephen Lloyd, Craig Gerard (executive story editor), Matthew Zinman (executive story editor), Daniel Gregor (executive story editor), Doug Mand (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: When Robin is hesitant to break up with Nick, Barney takes matters into his own hands. Meanwhile, Lily and Marshall are desperate for some private time.
